channel.description: Recent content in Posts on mlblogg

item.title: SQL 101 - A Quick start to Structured Query Language
item.description: SQL, or Structured Query Language, is a programming language that is used to communicate with databases. Think of it like a way to talk to a computer and tell it to give you specific information from a big collection of data.

item.title: What is a database ?
item.description: In simple words: A database is an organized collection of data so that it can be easily accessed. To manage these databases, Database Management Systems (DBMS) are used.
